node1.PC_Text: Hey Lassie! I think I'm gonna change my name to Annie O'Malley!

node1.NPC_Response: What are you talking about Annie? It's me, Fran.

A.PC_Text: I'm good! What's new with you?
A.NPC_Response: Not much.  Did you have a nice weekend?

A.PC_Text: I'm good! Wishing it were Friday already.
A.NPC_Response: Well, you've only just started work!

A.PC_Text: I feel like getting a little crazy this  morning! Let's go dancing!
A.NPC_Response: Uh, but it's Monday morning, Annie.

B.NPC_Response: Not much! I am just planning my vacation this summer.

B.PC_Text: I'm really feeling the Irish spirit today!
B.NPC_Response: Well, you should wear a green shirt then.
Um, I don't know what you mean.

C.PC_Text: Oh right. Sorry I didn't recognize you for a moment. How are you?
C.NPC_Response: Oh that's ok. I'm doing well. How are you doing?

C.PC_Text: How do I know it’s really you?
I didn't recognize you with that weird haircut! How are you?
C.NPC_Response: I was just trying out a new look... I'm fine. How are you?

AA.PC_Text: I did! I went to the mall and bought this new dress.
Yes! I went to Harry Potter Wizardry camp and learned a ton of new spells.
AA.NPC_Response: Oh, wow, that sounds like... fun.

AA.PC_Text: I did! I called all of my ex-boyfriends and cried until they offered to get back together with me.
AA.NPC_Response: Oh, Annie. That doesn’t sound good…

AB.NPC_Response: You'll see. The week will fly by!

AB.PC_Text: You look like you could use a long weekend too!
Why do you care if I'm burned out from my first day of work!

AC.NPC_Response: That sounds like a better plan.
We are at work, and it's your first day on the job!

AC.PC_Text: I'll ask Managing Mike to join me! He looks like he has the right  moves!
AC.NPC_Response: I don't think that's a very good idea, Annie!

BA.PC_Text: Oh fun, where are you going?
BA.NPC_Response: I'm thinking of a relaxing beach vacation!

BA.PC_Text: I need to take advantage of my corporate discount!
BA.NPC_Response: Um, I would give it a little time before you plan a trip, Annie.

BA.PC_Text: Great. Where are we going? I'll pack my bags!
BA.NPC_Response: Oh, sorry Annie. I was planning on going with my family.

BB.PC_Text: I'm practicing for St. Patrick's day!
My psychic told me I was Irish in my last life.
I'm thinking of painting my face green like at a football game!
BB.NPC_Response: I'd wait until after work for that.

BC.NPC_Response: Well, I do have a boyfriend.

BC.PC_Text: How many men are you dating right now?
BC.NPC_Response: I have a boyfriend, Annie. You know that.

BC.PC_Text: What's the latest news with Fran's hot and spicy Friday date night?
BC.NPC_Response: Annie, I really don't know what you are talking about.

CA.PC_Text: I'm doing great! Happy to have this job.
CA.NPC_Response: That's great. It's good to have you here.

CA.PC_Text: Have you seen me? I'm obviously doing very well for myself.
CA.NPC_Response: Ah, yes, you look like you you're doing well.

CA.PC_Text: Are you kidding? My parents just bought me my own pony! I'm living the dream!

CB.PC_Text: I'm just joking. How are you doing, Fran?
Prove it! What was the name of our high school math teacher.
CB.NPC_Response: I don't remember that. You're being silly, Annie.

CB.PC_Text: Prove it! What’s your social security number?

CC.PC_Text: Oh, it looks great on you. It's just different.
CC.NPC_Response: Oh thanks. It's nice to have a change!

CC.PC_Text: You look a little like Peter Pan, but in a good way.
CC.NPC_Response: Um, how is that a good thing?

CC.PC_Text: Oh, I mistook you for 1970's rock and roll legend Mick Jagger.
CC.NPC_Response: I don't even know how to respond to that.
